org.apache.lucene.util

Interface Accountable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitDocIdSet, BitSet, BitsFilteredDocIdSet, BlockPackedReader, BlockTreeTermsReader, CachingWrapperFilter, CodecReader, CompressingStoredFieldsIndexReader, CompressingStoredFieldsReader, CompressingTermVectorsReader, DocIdSet, DocValuesDocIdSet, DocValuesProducer, EliasFanoDocIdSet, EliasFanoEncoder, FieldReader, FieldsProducer, FilterCodecReader, FilteredDocIdSet, FixedBitSet, FrequencyTrackingRingBuffer, FST, GrowableWriter, IndexWriter, LRUFilterCache, Lucene50PostingsReader, MonotonicBlockPackedReader, MultiDocValues.OrdinalMap, NormsProducer, NotDocIdSet, NRTCachingDirectory, PackedInts.Mutable, PackedInts.NullReader, PackedInts.Reader, PackedLongValues, PackedLongValues.Builder, PagedBytes, PagedBytes.Reader, PagedGrowableWriter, PagedMutable, PostingsReaderBase, RAMDirectory, RAMFile, RAMOutputStream, RoaringDocIdSet, SegmentReader, SparseFixedBitSet, StoredFieldsReader, TermVectorsReader

    public interface Accountable
    An object whose RAM usage can be computed.
    NOTE: This API is for internal purposes only and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Accountable> getChildResources()
      Returns nested resources of this class.
      long ramBytesUsed()
      Return the memory usage of this object in bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • ramBytesUsed

        long ramBytesUsed()
        Return the memory usage of this object in bytes. Negative values are illegal.

      • getChildResources

        Collection<Accountable> getChildResources()
        Returns nested resources of this class. The result should be a point-in-time snapshot (to avoid race conditions).
        See Also:
        Accountables
